original_text: They are doing the same evil things that their ancestors did. Their ancestors refused to obey my commands. These people do that, and they also serve and worship other gods. I made a covenant with their ancestors. But the nations of Judah and Israel have refused to obey that covenant.
korean_text: 그들이 내 말 듣기를 거절한 자기들의 선조의 죄악으로 돌아가서 다른 신들을 따라 섬겼은즉 이스라엘 집과 유다 집이 내가 그들의 조상들과 맺은 언약을 깨뜨렸도다

sentences.original_text: They are doing the same evil things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 동일한 악한 행위를 하고 있으며

sentences.original_text: Their ancestors refused to obey my commands
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 조상들은 나의 명령을 순종하기를 거부했습니다

sentences.original_text: and they also serve and worship other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또한 다른 신들을 섬기고 숭배합니다

sentences.original_text: I made a covenant with their ancestors
But the nations of Judah and Israel
have refused to obey that covenant
